pullrequest.title: Implement a parameter to set which OSRF repos to use when building

content.raw:
I have: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo7-debbuilder/335/parameters/. gazebo7 on Xenial in the prerelease repo for the ROS folks. It needs to use prereleaseto get libsdformat4-dev when building (it is still in xenial-proposed, not available by default).

I have used it sometime before, probably in the haptix or mentor builds.

The current problem with mentor is the change in name that happen in the last build, I need to fix it and take it back to the old name.
content.html:
I have: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo7-debbuilder/335/parameters/. gazebo7 on Xenial in the prerelease repo for the ROS folks. It needs to use prereleaseto get libsdformat4-dev when building (it is still in xenial-proposed, not available by default).

I have used it sometime before, probably in the haptix or mentor builds.

The current problem with mentor is the change in name that happen in the last build, I need to fix it and take it back to the old name.
